Notes

Limited to 125 hand-numbered copies. Housed in a 315g black card stock fold-over cover with white silkscreened printing. Comes with an A2 poster and black poly-lined innerbag. Recorded in 2020 / 2021 in Cracow. Tracks are numbered sequentially on the back cover.
